    SLICSuperPixels
    a variant of kmeans whose goal is to make k super-pixels in the image based upon CIE Lab color similarity and x,y proximity.

    a variant of kmeans whose goal is to make k super-pixels in the image based upon greyscale similarity and x,y proximity.
